name: COOKIE JAR
description:
Please Read!!

Better quality & game performance when in full-screen

oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo

Put your skills to the test! Collect all 10 cookies in the jar and become the Cookie Jar Master

oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo

How to play

Drag/grab the bottle using the left mouse 

Release the left mouse when you are ready to throw the bottle 

Press R to restart the level

oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo

Wallpaper design : charl.ene#0194

****

Music:- https://opengameart.org/  

Notice:- There will be an update later on to fix the screen size. Sorry for the inconvenience.
